objects.name: Distribute malicious software development tools
objects.description:
An adversary could distribute malicious software development tools (e.g., compiler) that hide malicious behavior in software built using the tools. (Citation: PA XcodeGhost) (Citation: Reflections on Trusting Trust)

Detectable by Common Defenses: No

Difficulty for the Adversary: No

external_references.description: Claud Xiao. (2015, September 17). Novel Malware XcodeGhost Modifies Xcode, Infects Apple iOS Apps and Hits App Store. Retrieved April 12, 2017.
Ken Thompson. (1984, August). Reflections on Trusting Trust. Retrieved April 12, 2017.
